Title: Establishes the work opportunity tax credit for businesses with fifty employees or less for hiring a long term unemployed person
Summary: Establishes the work opportunity tax credit for businesses with fifty employees or less for hiring a long term unemployed person; provides a credit shall be allowed of up to $2,400; provides the total amount of credit provided statewide shall not exceed fifteen million dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing the work opportunity tax credit
